name: Idle Breakout, But Epic
description:
NOTE: The web version is currently broken, currently you can only look at the menus and press buttons (but they won't do anything). If you want to actually play the game, you'll have to download one of the executables below.

This is a clone of Kodiqi's Idle Breakout, which I made for my Intro to Game Programming class.

My version is scuffed as hell, you can find the original here if you'd like to check it out.

Just click to break bricks, or click the buttons to buy balls and upgrades. That's it!

I would recommend staying away from the cannonball. It's.... a bit broken.
